name: Mind Over Mushroom
description: Mind Over Mushroom is a turn-based, tactical strategy game where movement isn't locked to a grid. Command a diverse array of unlockable characters including giant snails, walking bombs, and necromancers. Use clever tactics and a variety of status effects to defeat a grave fungal threat.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 2 GB available space
